entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, The Pas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: The Pas Airport 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -20.1°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h gust 35 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
